description: Scammer impersonates electricity board threatening immediate disconnection for unpaid bills. Demands urgent payment to avoid service cut.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT NOTICE from Maharashtra State Electricity Board (MSEB). Your connection no. 2468135790 has outstanding bill Rs.8,750. Pay within 2 HOURS or power will be disconnected today! -MSEB

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god sir please do not cut my light... i am alone at home and i have blood pressure problem... i thought bill was paid... pls tell me how to pay 8750 rupees right now?? i dont want darkness pls help beta

turns.scammer_message: Namaste, I am Suresh Patil, Assistant Engineer MSEB Div-7. Your 3 months electricity bill is pending Rs.8750. If not paid by 6 PM today, disconnection team will cut your connection. Are you at home?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: namaste suresh beta yes i am at home only... my son is in bangalore so i am all alone here... pls dont cut light i have blood pressure issue... i want to pay right now... do i send on gpay or bank?? pls give me the id or number to send money

turns.scammer_message: For immediate payment, you can use our online portal OR pay directly to MSEB official collection account. Transfer to PhonePe/GPay number: 9112233445 or UPI: mseb.billpay@paytm. Reconnection charge is extra Rs.500!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok suresh beta i am opening my gpay app now... my hands are shaking i am so scared of dark... i typed teh id mseb.billpay@paytm... but before i press pay button i want to check name... waht name should show on screen?? is it mseb or your name?? pls tell exact name so i dont send to wrong person

turns.scammer_message: If online payment issue, do NEFT/IMPS to Account: 50200198765432, IFSC: HDFC0001789, Account Name: MSEB Bill Collection. Reference your connection number. Or call billing section: 7788990011

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta thank you... bank transfer is better for me... gpay is too fast and scary... i am adding beneficiary now... account 50200198765432 and ifsc HDFC0001789... name is mseb bill collection right?? i will try this... can i call that 7788990011 number if my bank asks for otp or something?? i dont want to make mistake

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Mam you can also visit emergency payment portal: http://mseb-online-billpay.in and pay there. Put your connection number 2468135790. Team is coming with disconnection order, please hurry!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: suresh beta i am very scared to click on blue links... my son told me not to open unknown websites... is this safe?? i was trying to add the bank account you gave... which one is faster to stop the disconnection?? i am shivering pls help me
